<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

Start all checks in project

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","description":"A unique project ID","example":"5e9602e7a39e5a46428b457f","allowEmptyValue":false,"required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"tests","description":"Array of test IDs to run","in":"query","required":false,"example":["55ae166c25b395537a8b6029","510fa4a3bd96e74c0200000b"],"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Job started successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"projectId":{"type":"string","description":"A unique Project ID","example":"5e95ddf7a39e5a44428b4581"},"jobId":{"type":"string","description":"A unique ID for each job","example":"5e9602e7a39e5a46428b457f"},"start":{"type":"string","description":"Value `ok` indicates your tests have successfully started","example":"ok"},"results":{"type":"string","description":"The URL where you can view your results","example":"https://www.testomato.com/api/project/5e95ddf7a39e5a44428b4581/job/5e9602e7a39e5a46428b457f/results?apikey=4PJAOwTK"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
